summary: The SBIR/STTR Reauthorization Act of 2025 aims to reauthorize and modify the Small Business Innovation Research (SBIR) and Small Business Technology Transfer (STTR) programs. Key provisions include extending program authority, increasing agency expenditures, enhancing competition, improving commercialization, and establishing pilot programs. The bill also addresses oversight, simplification, technical changes, and database reporting related to these programs, aiming to foster innovation and support small businesses, particularly in areas like technology development and commercialization. It also includes measures for outreach and assistance for small businesses.
